QuestData.Title: Garden in Turmoil
QuestData.Description:
Please excuse me for not standing. I would rather not disturb these creatures.
If you have a desire to help the creatures of Bastion, Zosime needs aid to regain control of our garden. You will find her just down this path.
Go in service.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Zosime downhill in the Garden of Respite.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, you're here to lend a hand? Wonderful!
